statement.p: An approximation of the speed at which a vehicle will hydroplane on water (complete loss of traction) is
\displaystyle{V} is the velocity in miles per hour
\displaystyle{p} is the tire pressure in psi
You plan to travel no faster than \displaystyle{50}. miles per hour. To be somewhat safe from hydroplaning, what pressure should your tires be over? psi
These are science measurements. Round appropriately.
